product_name: NYX Professional MakeupRetractable Vivid Rich Mechanical Eyeliner Pencil
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackThe Mechanical Eye Pencil from NYX Professional Makeup you know and love is back and better combing intense pigment with ultimate staying power!
details: DetailsBenefitsFrom spicy pearl to amber stunner, these razor-sharp liners will be your prized gems for the richest eye look ever!Twist up mechanical eye liner pencil that never needs sharpening!The hydrating formula glides on effortlessly & lasts all dayThis long lasting eyeliner is smudge-proof through heat and humidity12, 1-swipe vivid shades, loaded with creamy gem-tone pigments that enhance & brighten eyes and finish off your lookUse to create a classic winged eye look or play with lining your waterline & tightlining100% vegan formula (no animal-derived ingredient or by-product)Cruelty freeItem 2617123How To UseSelect your shade and glide on gem-tone eyeliner along your upper lash line to create an easy eye makeup look. Or, extend the line past your outer corners for a bold, dramatic wing (you can add eyeshadow for extra oomph).IngredientsMethyl Trimethicone, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Oryza Sativa Cera / Rice Bran Wax, Oryza Sativa Bran Cera / Rice Bran Wax, Octyldodecanol, Acrylates/Dimethicone Copolymer, CI 77266 [Nano] / Black 2, CI 77510 / Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide, Propylene Carbonate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate
how_to_use: Select your shade and glide on gem-tone eyeliner along your upper lash line to create an easy eye makeup look. Or, extend the line past your outer corners for a bold, dramatic wing (you can add eyeshadow for extra oomph).
ingredients: Oryza Sativa Cera / Rice Bran Wax
Oryza Sativa Bran Cera / Rice Bran Wax

reviews.headline: Staying power
reviews.comments: Pencil works well, stays on eyes good but it was broken in three places so i have to piece it together each time I use it. I don't have time to take it back.

reviews.headline: Why Not Nyx
reviews.comments: I've started recently swapping MAC eye liners (which break, dry out, & disappoint) for NYX gurlz! Come on it's the best dupe eva!

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: I got emerald empire. Goes on easy, not irritating. But it did oxidize to be darker and almost looked black. I wanted a not neon green. Not sure if I will keep it.

reviews.headline: Easy Application!
reviews.comments: Love Under The Moonstone. A soft warm brown that really compliments my fair skin and my naturally graying auburn hair. Definitely interested in checking out more color options. Not only did I recommend to a friend I got one for her!

reviews.headline: Definitely would buy again
reviews.comments: Really like this product and have bought it more than once.  Goes on smooth and stays in place for hours.  The colors are really nice and varied.  Would definitely recommend to a friend.

reviews.headline: Worth the purchase
reviews.comments: Love this eyeliner! It glides on smoothly!

reviews.headline: creamy, pigmented, stays put
reviews.comments:
Bought 3 during a buy 2 get 1 free promo. I purchased the shades Always Onyx, Truffle Diamond, and Quartz Queen. Quartz Queen is the perfect shade for tightlining along the bottom waterline to open up the eye. Because it's a pretty light nude, it's more subtle for us pale girlies, but would obviously be a more dramatic highlighting shade for dark skin, so keep that in mind. All three shades are very creamy and pigmented, and they glide on softly and smoothly. Because they are so soft, be extra careful during application, as the pencil can slip around a bit.

The liner stays in place very well, but it also dries very fast, meaning that it is harder to smudge (although it can be done if you're smudging WITH an eyeshadow). Because of this, mistakes are harder to fix.

I haven't tested its longevity much, so I can't testify to that. Overall, it's a nice, creamy liner, but I wouldn't recommend it as a base color if you're looking to smudge it out for a smokier look.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I need only to apply this product once, with an eye lid base, and it stays on all day.  I have used it for years.

reviews.headline: Like it
reviews.comments: I bought it because of brand and the price. And it is persistent

reviews.headline: Emerald is good
reviews.comments: I got the color Emerald Empire. It's a nice dark green, very forest vibes. Really makes my brown eyes look good. Creamy, easy to apply. Easy to blend.

reviews.headline: Smooth going on
reviews.comments: I really like these they go on super smooth and stays on for a long ling time! I recommend this product!

reviews.headline: Poor product
reviews.comments: I purchased this eyeliner in three colors. Usually I purchase at the store, but I bought these online and had them shipped to me. They were AWFUL. Dried out from the start. Will not spread at all and are useless unless I break off a bit, then try, but even then it's just a mess. So frustrating and I give up. They are going in the trash.

reviews.headline: Would not buy again
reviews.comments: Can't get a sharp solid line - smudges really bad

reviews.headline: Will buy again
reviews.comments: I love this lipliner. Its smooth and glides on easy. Ot doesnt stay as long as i would like it to but i dont mind reapplying. I got the color cocoa. Its beautiful shade of brown. The only problem i found was that my products wasnt attached to the tube. Like it was loose. So i had it for couple of months and used it alot. But this one day i guess i didnt clip the top fully and i lost the tube of liner in it. Lol. But im gonna repurchase this for sure

reviews.headline: Perfect blue
reviews.comments: Was looking for a dark blue liner yo go with my brown shadows for the longest time.  It was exactly what I was looking for and is easy to apply.

reviews.headline: would not buy
reviews.comments: dry and broke off and fell out of the applicator. Not much product.

reviews.headline: Formula is amazing
reviews.comments: Great creamy liner. I was hesitant because I prefer color pencil liners for the sharpness, but this eyeliner has really rich payoff (better than other nyx eyeliner pencils) and the tip is small enough to have a point. I also love the color I got because its a gorgeous creamy brown that really compliments the eye. Would love to buy again in a wider shade range!

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Always used this Black eyeliner - been running for years. I did notice, the formula has improved for all other colors. Since Black is their tried and true, they kept the same quality. All I have to say is: Black runs/smudges while the others doesn't

reviews.headline: the eyeliner keeps falling out and very easy to smear
reviews.comments: Its overall a good eyeliner bc it looks good but the stick of it falls out constantly and then the eyeliner will look good for about 20 minutes before smudging

reviews.headline: the eyeliner keeps falling out and very easy to smear
reviews.comments: Its overall a good eyeliner bc it looks good but the stick of it falls out constantly and then the eyeliner will look good for about 20 minutes before smudging

media.headline: Completely broke each time I used it.
Eyeliner found in the Lipliner section

faceoff_positive.comments:
Calling all blue lovers! The Vivid Rich Mechanical Pencil in Blue is the perfect pencil for you. It's bold, pigmented, and long-wearing, and it stays put all day long.

I have oily skin, so I know what it's like to have makeup fade away after a few hours. But the Vivid Rich Mechanical Pencil is different. It's waterproof and smudge-proof, so it stays looking fresh and fierce all day long.

I love using this pencil to line my eyes and waterline. The color is a dark but vibrant blue that makes my eyes pop. I've also been using it to create bold, graphic eyeliner looks, and it's perfect for that too.

If you're looking for a blue pencil that is truly bluetiful, then the Vivid Rich Mechanical Pencil in Blue is the one for you. It's a must-have for a great price! I'm already looking to purchase a few other colors, I'm very happy with this eyeliner! 

Thanks to Influenster and NYX for allowing me to test this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion. New fan!
faceoff_positive.headline: Bluetiful Alert! The Vivid Rich Mechanical Pencil in Blue...

faceoff_negative.comments: I had high hopes for this product based on the name of the line and the swatches￼, alas the shade I got, Deep Blue, looks neither rich, nor vivid on me. The application is super smooth without tugging, however, I am getting very sheer color in one pass, so I have to do two or three passes just to get the look I want and at that point, quite frankly, you would have to look very closely to tell it's the dark blue and not a grayish black. For some reason the pretty sparkle, you see when looking at the product itself does not come through for me when I have this eyeliner on - it just looks dull and not particularly exciting. Perhaps some other shades from this line produce better results, but I am definitely finding of this shade to be rather underwhelming. ￼ I do like the twist-up pencil format of this product,and it has decent staying power, but that's about it on the positives of this shade.
faceoff_negative.headline: Disappointing
